DataElement.preferredDefinition: The [start] time of the study treatment represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Recommend collecting the time a medication was started only when a protocol or data collection scenarios requires it.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start time (as complete as possible) when administration of study treatment started.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EXSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable EXSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2004095 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
